## Query.findById() method

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Finds single item from the IndexedDB

**Signature:**

```typescript
findById(id: IDBValidKey, options?: QueryFindByIdOptions): this;
```

</th><th>

Search id


</td></tr>

</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Query options


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

this


## Example


```ts
const query = new Query(idb, "store-name");
const item = await query.findById("id");
```
